00003 #include "ORHeaderDecoder.hh"
00004 #include "ORLogger.hh"
00005 #include "ORUtils.hh"

00007 ORHeaderDecoder::EOrcaStreamVersion ORHeaderDecoder::GetStreamVersion(UInt_t firstWordOfStream)
00008 {
00009   // check this first, for speed.
00010   if(ORVDataDecoder::DataIdOf(&firstWordOfStream) == ExpectedDataId()) return kNewUnswapped;
00011 
00012   if (firstWordOfStream == FirstWordOldVersion()) return kOld;
00013 
00014   ORUtils::Swap(firstWordOfStream);
00015   if(ORVDataDecoder::DataIdOf(&firstWordOfStream) == ExpectedDataId()) return kNewSwapped;
00016 
00017   return kUnknownVersion;
00018 }
00019 
00020 bool ORHeaderDecoder::IsHeader(UInt_t firstWordOfRecord)
00021 {
00022   // This function expects that the ORVReader has already determined the
00023   // file version when the file was first opened and has swapped the first
00024   // word if necessary.
00025   EOrcaStreamVersion fileVersion = GetStreamVersion(firstWordOfRecord);
00026   if(fileVersion == kOld || fileVersion == kNewUnswapped) return true;
00027   // We no longer support the old header.
00028   /*if(fileVersion == kNewUnswapped) return true;
00029   else if(fileVersion == kOld){
00030     ORLog(kWarning) << "Header not recognized.  It is either old or corrupted." << endl;
00031     return false;
00032   }*/
00033   else return false;
00034 }
